title.rendered: How P&G has evolved its climate strategy to target a net-zero value chain by 2040

content.rendered:
EXCLUSIVE: Procter & Gamble (P&G) has today (14 September) unveiled a new climate action plan to reach net-zero emissions across its value chain by 2040, with the company’s vice president for global sustainability Jack Mcaneny telling edie that the “absolute priority is reducing emissions”.

Read the Full Article

Read the Full Article
